AT.name: Tom Clancy’s™ Splinter Cell® 3D
AT.description: Mit "Tom Clancys Splinter Cell 3D" erscheint exklusiv für Nintendo 3DS™ das lang erwartete tragbare Videospiel aus der millionenfach verkauften "Splinter Cell"-Reihe, die das Stealth/Action-Genre neu definiert hat. "Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell 3D" führt Tom Clancys Sam Fisher hinter feindliche Linien auf der koreanischen Halbinsel, um den dritten Weltkrieg zu verhindern und herauszufinden, wer für den Angriff auf den fortschrittlichsten US-Kreuzer – die USS Clarence E. Walsh – verantwortlich ist. Bei seinen Untersuchungen findet Sam heraus, dass es zwei Hauptverantwortliche gibt, die die Masse-Kernels einsetzen und einen dritten Weltkrieg provozieren wollen: die Kriegskameraden Douglas Shetland von Displace International und Admiral Otomo, der Kontaktmann bei der Third Echelon Information Self Defense Force (I-SDF). Jetzt ist es Sams Ziel, ihre Operationsgebiete zu infiltrieren und ihre Machenschaften aufzudecken, bevor sie einen neuen tödlichen Konflikt heraufbeschwören können, der die ganze Welt mit sich reißt.

AU.name: Tom Clancy’s™ Splinter Cell® 3D
AU.description: Coming exclusively to Nintendo 3DS™, Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D is the highly anticipated handheld game in the multimillion-selling Splinter Cell series that redefined the stealth/action genre. In Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D, Sam Fisher is sent behind enemy lines in the Korean Peninsula to prevent WWIII by investigating the responsible party that sunk the USS Clarence E. Walsh, the U.S.’s most advanced cruiser. Through his investigation, Sam learns that the key parties who are planning to use the Masse Kernels and launch WWIII are war comrade Douglas Shetland, Displace International, and Admiral Otomo, the Third Echelon Information Self Defence Force (I-SDF) contact. His goal will be to infiltrate their lines and expose their deeds before they manage to launch a new and deadly worldwide conflict.

BG.name: Tom Clancy’s™ Splinter Cell® 3D
BG.description: Coming exclusively to Nintendo 3DS™, Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D is the highly anticipated handheld game in the multimillion-selling Splinter Cell series that redefined the stealth/action genre. In Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D, Sam Fisher is sent behind enemy lines in the Korean Peninsula to prevent WWIII by investigating the responsible party that sunk the USS Clarence E. Walsh, the U.S.’s most advanced cruiser. Through his investigation, Sam learns that the key parties who are planning to use the Masse Kernels and launch WWIII are war comrade Douglas Shetland, Displace International, and Admiral Otomo, the Third Echelon Information Self Defence Force (I-SDF) contact. His goal will be to infiltrate their lines and expose their deeds before they manage to launch a new and deadly worldwide conflict.

BE.name: Tom Clancy’s™ Splinter Cell® 3D
BE.description: Avec Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell 3D, en exclusivité sur Nintendo 3DS™, retrouvez l'épisode pour console portable tant attendu issu de la célèbre série Splinter Cell, qui s'est déjà vendue à plusieurs millions d'exemplaires en réinventant le genre action/infiltration. Sam Fisher est envoyé sur le front ennemi dans la péninsule coréenne afin d'éviter une troisième guerre mondiale. Il va donc mener l'enquête sur l'organisation qui a coulé l'USS Clarence E. Walsh, le croiseur le plus sophistiqué des États-Unis. Au fil de son investigation, Sam découvre que les membres de l'organisation prévoyant de déclencher la troisième guerre mondiale ne sont autres que le combattant Douglas Shetland, de Displace International, et l'amiral Otomo, le contact de l'I-SDF (Information Self Defense Force) d'Echelon 3. Sa mission : infiltrer leurs rangs et dévoiler leur plan avant qu'ils ne parviennent à déclencher un nouveau conflit mondial aux conséquences désastreuses.

CH.name: Tom Clancy’s™ Splinter Cell® 3D
CH.description: Mit "Tom Clancys Splinter Cell 3D" erscheint exklusiv für Nintendo 3DS™ das lang erwartete tragbare Videospiel aus der millionenfach verkauften "Splinter Cell"-Reihe, die das Stealth/Action-Genre neu definiert hat. Bei seinen Untersuchungen findet Sam heraus, dass es zwei Hauptverantwortliche gibt, die die Masse-Kernels einsetzen und einen dritten Weltkrieg provozieren wollen: die Kriegskameraden Douglas Shetland von Displace International und Admiral Otomo, der Kontaktmann bei der Third Echelon Information Self Defense Force (I-SDF). Jetzt ist es Sams Ziel, ihre Operationsgebiete zu infiltrieren und ihre Machenschaften aufzudecken, bevor sie einen neuen tödlichen Konflikt heraufbeschwören können, der die ganze Welt mit sich reißt.

ES.name: Tom Clancy’s™ Splinter Cell® 3D
ES.description: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell 3D, el esperado nuevo juego de la popular serie Splinter Cell -que redefinió el género de acción/sigilo-, se prepara para hacer una entrada a lo grande en la consola Nintendo 3DS™. En Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell 3D, Sam Fisher es enviado a la península coreana para evitar una Tercera Guerra Mundial. Para ello, tendrá que investigar quién está involucrado en el hundimiento del USS Clarence E. Walsh, el crucero de batalla estadounidense más avanzado de la flota. Durante la investigación, Sam descubre que las personas claves detrás del complot para utilizar los algoritmos Masse Kernels y provocar así una Tercera Guerra Mundial son: su antiguo camarada Douglas Shetland, Displace International y Admiral Otomo del I-SDF. Su objetivo será infiltrarse en sus líneas y sacar a la luz sus planes antes de que consigan provocar un nuevo conflicto mundial.

IT.name: Tom Clancy’s™ Splinter Cell® 3D
IT.description: Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D, in esclusiva per Nintendo 3DS™, è l'attesissimo gioco della serie Splinter Cell, che ha venduto milioni di copie e ha ridefinito il genere stealth / azione. In Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D, Sam Fisher è inviato a spiare le linee nemiche nella penisola coreana per impedire lo scoppio della terza Guerra mondiale, facendo chiarezza su chi abbia affondato l'USS Clarence E. Walsh, l'incrociatore più avanzato degli USA. Nel corso della sua indagine Sam apprende che le principali parti coinvolte, che si apprestano a usare i Masse Kernels e a far esplodere la terza guerra mondiale, sono il commilitone Douglas Shetland, Displace International, e l'ammiraglio Otomo, il contatto della Third Echelon Information Self Defense Force (I-SDF). Il suo obiettivo è quello d'infiltrarsi nelle loro linee e svelare le loro intenzioni prima che riescano a scatenare un nuovo e letale conflitto mondiale.

NL.name: Tom Clancy’s™ Splinter Cell® 3D
NL.description: Exclusief voor Nintendo 3DS™ verschijnt Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell 3D, een handheldtitel waar veel fans van de Splinter Cell-reeks reikhalzend naar uitkijken. Deze populaire serie heeft miljoenen verkochte exemplaren op zijn naam staan en stond aan de wieg van het stealth-actiegenre, zoals we dat vandaag de dag kennen. In Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D wordt Sam Fisher naar het Koreaans schiereiland gestuurd om de derde wereldoorlog te voorkomen. Hij begeeft zich achter de vijandelijke linies en moet onderzoeken wie de USS Clarence E. Walsh, de meest geavanceerde kruiser van de VS, tot zinken heeft gebracht. Zijn onderzoek wijst uit dat zijn oorlogskameraad Douglas Shetland, Displace International en contactpersoon admiraal Otomo van de Third Echelon Information Self Defense Force (I-SDF) de belangrijkste partijen zijn achter de ramp. Zij zijn van plan om de buitgemaakte Masse Kernels te gebruiken, om zo de derde wereldoorlog te ontketenen. Sam moet hun linies zien te infiltreren en hun daden aan het licht proberen te brengen, voordat ze erin slagen om een nieuw en dodelijk wereldwijd conflict te veroorzaken.

NZ.name: Tom Clancy’s™ Splinter Cell® 3D
NZ.description: Coming exclusively to Nintendo 3DS™, Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D is the highly anticipated handheld game in the multimillion-selling Splinter Cell series that redefined the stealth/action genre. In Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D, Sam Fisher is sent behind enemy lines in the Korean Peninsula to prevent WWIII by investigating the responsible party that sunk the USS Clarence E. Walsh, the U.S.’s most advanced cruiser. PT.name: Tom Clancy’s™ Splinter Cell® 3D
PT.description: Tom Clancy's Splinter Cell 3D, o ansiado novo jogo da popular série Splinter Cell que redefiniu o género de ação furtiva, prepara-se para fazer uma chegada em grande à Nintendo 3DS™. Em Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D, Sam Fisher é enviado para território inimigo, na Península da Coreia com o objetivo de evitar a III Guerra Mundial investigandoos responsáveis pelo naufrágio do USS Clarence E. Walsh, o navio de guerra mais avançado dos EUA. Nas suas investigações, Sam descobre que quem está a planear usar as Masse Kernels e iniciar a guerra são os camaradas de combate Douglas Shetland, Displace International, e Admiral Otomo, o contacto da Third Echelon Information Self Defense Force (I-SDF). O seu objetivo será infiltrar-se em território inimigo e expor os seus planos antes que consigam gerar um novo e mortífero conflito mundial.

RU.name: Tom Clancy’s™ Splinter Cell® 3D
RU.description: НАСТОЯЩИЙ СТЕЛС-ЭКШЕН В СТЕРЕОСКОПИЧЕСКОМ 3D! - Управление в одно касание - Новое снаряжение и оружие

ZA.name: Tom Clancy’s™ Splinter Cell® 3D
ZA.description: Coming exclusively to Nintendo 3DS™, Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D is the highly anticipated handheld game in the multimillion-selling Splinter Cell series that redefined the stealth/action genre. In Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell 3D, Sam Fisher is sent behind enemy lines in the Korean Peninsula to prevent WWIII by investigating the responsible party that sunk the USS Clarence E. Walsh, the U.S.’s most advanced cruiser. Through his investigation, Sam learns that the key parties who are planning to use the Masse Kernels and launch WWIII are war comrade Douglas Shetland, Displace International, and Admiral Otomo, the Third Echelon Information Self Defence Force (I-SDF) contact. His goal will be to infiltrate their lines and expose their deeds before they manage to launch a new and deadly worldwide conflict.
